text: David Muir (born November 8, 1973) is the anchor of World News Tonight on ABC News. Muir also hosts special events and breaking news stories. He formerly anchored the weekend version of the show until he replaced Diane Sawyer in 2014. He was born in Syracuse, New York. He co-moderated a Republican and a Democratic debate for ABC News alongside of Martha Raddatz. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from New York (state) Category:Writers from Syracuse, New York Category:Television personalities from New York (state)
title: David Muir
